powers.name: Prestige.Prestige_Attacks.prestige_Permanent_Undead_Slaying_Axe
powers.display_help: This massive weapon was specifically crafted by MAGI to slay the undead. Note that Mastermind Henchmen are protected from this effect. Damage enhancing powers do not apply to the Ghost Slaying Axe. Damage: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Bonus vs True Undead

powers.name: Prestige.Prestige_Attacks.prestige_Permanent_Nemesis_Staff
powers.display_help: This strange, steam-powered staff shoots a bolt of energy that deals damage, knocks back foes. The Nemesis is particularly effective when wielded by Technology, Science or Natural origin individuals. Damage enhancing powers do not apply to the Nemesis Staff. Damage: Moderate

powers.display_help: You have found some strange black sand. While carrying it, you have the ability to deal a flurry of punches charged with the Negative Energy of the Netherworld. Damage enhancing powers do not apply to the Sands of Mu. Damage: High

display_info.Effect Area: Cone  7 ft. radius 45 arc (5 targets max)

powers.name: Prestige.Prestige_Attacks.Brawl_Charm
powers.display_help: You have learned a simple magic spell: the Apprentice Charm. This cantrip has a very short range, and deals minor Energy damage to your target, as well as lowering their resistance to further damage. This power receives a damage bonus that decreases as you level up. At around level 15 you stop benefiting from this power's damage bonus altogether. Damage: Minor

powers.name: Prestige.Prestige_Attacks.Brawl_Knives
powers.display_help: You've acquired these throwing knives as part of your personal arsenal. You can throw these knives at a very short range, and deal minor Lethal damage to your target, but a nasty wound will do additional Damage over Time. This power receives a damage bonus that decreases as you level up. At around level 15 you stop benefiting from this power's damage bonus altogether. Damage: Minor (DoT)

powers.name: Prestige.Prestige_Attacks.Brawl_Mutagen
powers.display_help: You have recently come into possession of these capsules of genetic Mutagen. You can hurl these capsules at your enemies at very short range, where they explode on impact. They deal only minor toxic damage but the mutagen's secondary effect will lower the damage the affected target deals out. This power receives a damage bonus that decreases as you level up. At around level 15 you stop benefiting from this power's damage bonus altogether. Damage: Minor

powers.name: Prestige.Prestige_Attacks.Brawl_Taser
powers.display_help: You have acquired a basic technological weapon: a Taser Dart. This attack has a very short range and does minor Energy damage to your target. In addition it has a chance to Hold your opponent for a brief moment. This power receives a damage bonus that decreases as you level up. At around level 15 you stop benefiting from this power's damage bonus altogether. Damage: Minor

powers.name: Prestige.Prestige_Attacks.Brawl_Tranq
powers.display_help: Thanks to the advances of science, you know have access to a basic chemical weapon: the Tranq Dart. This attack can be used at short range to deal minor Lethal and Toxic damage to a target. In addition there is a small chance you can put the target to Sleep with this dart, but they will wake up the next time they are damaged or healed. This power receives a damage bonus that decreases as you level up. At around level 15 you stop benefiting from this power's damage bonus altogether. Damage: Minor
